description: Applications based on SAP GUI for HTML in SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP - versions 7.89, 7.93, do not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. A successful attack can allow a malicious attacker to access and modify data through their ability to execute code in a user’s browser. There is no impact on the availability of the system

product.name: SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP applications based on SAPGUI for HTML (WebGUI)
SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP applications based on SAPGUI for HTML (WebGUI)
